settings.title: MADE CLEAN IN NEW YORK
settings.description: The average person applies over 120 chemicals to their face and body every day. We're on a mission to lower that average by ensuring every Blu Atlas product is composed of 96-100% naturally sourced ingredients, all thoroughly vetted through scientific research.

settings.title: About us
settings.body: Blu Atlas provides effective, premium skincare and fragrance solutions designed to maximize men’s confidence. We’re dedicated to crafting the most advanced formulations from clean, active ingredients that deliver visible results and sensational experiences.
